name: Nowhere Project (DanielOschepkov)
description:
Your save capsule broken, so you need to find some tools to fix it. But you need to be careful at this destructed world. All that remains after a nuclear war - endless desert and strange creatures, which walk here and there.

Gameplay

Find tools to fix your save capsule and go to a better world.

Content

- Music created by Mubert.

- Some models are taken from Sketchfab

- Game made with Unity

Developer

Game made by Daniel Oschepkov (Serious Duck Studio)
